resources.string: I build smooth Android experiences and love design-driven development.

I’m a passionate Android Developer with over 1 years of hands-on and self-learning experience. My journey began with a deep curiosity about how Android applications work, which led me to explore the world of programming and mobile development.
Currently, I’m expanding my skills by learning modern technologies like Kotlin and Jetpack Compose to build more efficient, responsive, and clean UIs — aiming to write scalable and maintainable code.
